import { toast, Slide } from "react-toastify"; // eslint-disable-next-line @typescript-eslint/explicit-module-boundary-types

export const errorToast = (text = "An error occured") => toast(text, {
  position: "bottom-center",
  hideProgressBar: true,
  draggable: false,
  autoClose: 5000,
  pauseOnHover: false,
  closeOnClick: true,
  transition: Slide,
  type: "error"
});
